title: Last Day to Vote for the Typophile Tee!
content:
Typophiles,   
   
Here's your friendly reminder that December 14th is your last day to vote for your favorite finalist for the Typophile Tee #2.   
   
Complete voting details are found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015092417/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/72/3094.html).   
   
Vote at [http://www.typophile.com/vote/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015092417/http:/www.typophile.com/vote/)   
   
Good luck to all our contestants!
author: Jared Benson
